cui_name: Acute Lung Injury/Acute Respiratory Distress Syndrome (ARDS)
reasoning: ARDS is an acute critical care syndrome with incidence estimates of 40-80 per 100k globally. Using 58.5 per 100k as global average from epidemiological studies. Acute condition measured by new case incidence annually.
source: Rubenfeld GD et al. (2005). Incidence and outcomes of acute lung injury. N Engl J Med. 353(16):1685-1693
